704090f-a.text:
Elton Street, south from Wortman Ave., showing a city street, which continues as a winding farm road, on its way towards Jamaica Bay.
July 5, 1934.
P L. Sperr.
704090f-a.folder: Elton Street & Wortman Avenue, Brooklyn, NY

707451f-a.text:
457-473 Wortman Ave., north side, from Elton to Linwood Streets, showing Soiefer Milk and Cream Farm. Also seen is row of homes on Elton Street, east
side, north from Wortman Ave.
July 5, 1934.
P. L. Sperr.
707451f-a.folder: Wortman Ave. & Elton St., Brooklyn, NY
